        public static int randomInteger(int min,
                                int max)
        Returns a random number between min (inclusive) and max (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum number (inclusive) of the generated integer
        max - the maximum number (exclusive) of the generated integer
        Returns:
        an integer between min (inclusive) and max (exclusive)
